attributes.action: Make Warfarin free on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My son underwent aortic valve & route replacement and mitral valve repair. He now relies on Warfarin to prevent clotting of his blood especially around the valve, which could kill him and thousands of others without this medication. This medication is life sustaining and therefore like Insulin should be exempt from charge on the NHS.
